function.name: indexOf
function.description: Returns the index of the first occurrence of a specified text in a string.

function.name: lastIndexOf
function.description: Returns the index of the last occurrence of a specified text in a string.

function.name: search
function.description: Returns the index of the first occurrence of a regular expression in a string.

function.name: substring
function.description: Returns the substring of a string. Parameters are start and end index. The character at the end index itself is not included.

function.name: replace
function.description: Replaces the first occurrence of a specified value with another value in a string.

function.name: toUpperCase
function.description: Converts a string to upper case.

function.name: toLowerCase
function.description: Converts a string to lower case.

function.name: concat
function.description: Concatenates two or more strings.

function.name: charAt
function.description: Returns the character at a specified index (0-based) in a string.

function.name: addDaysToNow
function.description: Adds the given amount of days to the current timestamp.

function.name: addHoursToNow
function.description: Adds the given amount of hours to the current timestamp.

function.name: Date
function.description: Returns the current date and time.

function.name: getFullYear
function.description: Returns the year of a date.

function.name: getMonth
function.description: Returns the month of a date (0-11).

function.name: getDate
function.description: Returns the day of month of a date (1-31).

function.name: getDay
function.description: Returns the day of week of a date (0=sunday, 6=saturday).

function.name: getHours
function.description: Returns the hour of a date (0-23).

function.name: getMinutes
function.description: Returns the minutes of the hour of a date (0-59).

function.name: parse
function.description: Parses a given date string.

function.name: abs
function.description: Returns the absolute value of a value.

function.name: ceil
function.description: Rounds a given value upwards to the nearest integer.

function.name: floor
function.description: Rounds a given value downwards to the nearest integer.

function.name: round
function.description: Rounds a given value to the nearest integer.

function.name: max
function.description: Returns the maximum value of multiple values.

function.name: min
function.description: Returns the minimum value of multiple values.

function.name: random
function.description: Returns a random number between 0 and 1 (exclusive).

function.name: random (integer)
function.description: Returns a random integer number between 0 and the used maximum value (exclusive).
